import "./UploadPage.scss" import Preview from "../../assets/Images/Upload-video-preview.jpg" import Publish from "../../assets/Images/publish.svg" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function UploadPage () { const navigate = useNavigate(); // returns a function const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); alert("Thank you for uploading your video."); navigate('/'); } return ( <>

Upload Video

TITLE YOUR VIDEO

ADD A VIDEO DESCRIPTION

CANCEL

) } export default UploadPage
